kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Set Variable If
kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Insert Into List
kw.doc: Inserts ``value`` into ``list`` to the position specified with ``index``.

kw.name: File Should Exist
kw.arg: msg=Robot Framework remote server binary not found (${DIRECTORY}/${BINARY_NAME}). Did you forget to build it in ${CONFIGURATION} configuration?
kw.doc: Fails unless the given ``path`` points to an existing file.

branch.condition: not ${SKIP_RUNNING_SERVER} and not ${SERVER_REMOTE_DEBUG} and not '${SYSTEM}' == 'Windows' and not ${NET_PLATFORM}

kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

branch.condition: not ${SKIP_RUNNING_SERVER} and ${SERVER_REMOTE_DEBUG} and not '${SYSTEM}' == 'Windows' and not ${NET_PLATFORM}

kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

kw.name: Fatal Error
kw.arg: Windows doesn't support server remote debug option.
kw.doc: Stops the whole test execution.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Import Library
kw.doc: Imports a library with the given name and optional arguments.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Convert To Lower Case
kw.doc: Converts string to lower case.

kw.name: Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Replace String Using Regexp
kw.doc: Replaces ``pattern`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Join Path
kw.doc: Joins the given path part(s) to the given base path.

test.name: Should Initialize DMA And Report

kw.name: Terminate Process
kw.doc: Stops the process gracefully or forcefully.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Strip String
kw.doc: Remove leading and/or trailing whitespaces from the given string.

kw.name: Set Test Message
kw.doc: Sets message for the current test case.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Timeout Occurred
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword if either a test or a keyword timeout has occurred.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.
